title: Battle of Hastings
visuals: Norman cavalry charging; Saxon shield wall; medieval banners; archers in action; battlefield landscape
prompt: A highly detailed, photo-realistic image of Battle of Hastings as it might have appeared at the time. The scene includes Norman cavalry charging, Saxon shield wall, medieval banners, archers in action, and battlefield landscape, depicted with authentic clothing, environment, and technology from the historical era. Captured as if by a high-resolution camera. No text or modern artifacts. Realistic proportions, cinematic style.
caption: The Battle of Hastings in 1066 was a pivotal moment in English history, marking the Norman conquest of England led by William the Conqueror against King Harold Godwinson.

title: The Signing of the Magna Carta
notable_figures: King John of England, Stephen Langton, William Marshal
visuals: King John signing the document; medieval barons observing; Runnymede meadow; medieval tents; thirteenth-century attire
prompt: A highly detailed, photo-realistic image of The Signing of the Magna Carta as it might have appeared at the time. The scene includes King John signing the document, medieval barons observing, Runnymede meadow, medieval tents, and thirteenth-century attire, depicted with authentic clothing, environment, and technology from the historical era. Captured as if by a high-resolution camera. No text or modern artifacts. Realistic proportions, cinematic style.
caption: The Magna Carta was signed in 1215 at Runnymede, marking a pivotal moment in the development of constitutional law by limiting the powers of the English monarchy.
